# The `OverflowingBinaryOperator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Utility class for integer operators which may exhibit overflow - Add, Sub, Mul, and Shl. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::OverflowingBinaryOperator</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Utility class for integer operators which may exhibit overflow - Add, Sub, Mul, and Shl.

It does not include SDiv, despite that operator having the potential for overflow.

Definition at line 77 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operator-h">Operator.h</a>.
